participant_1.background:
I want to spend more time with my grandchildren.
I wear a dress that makes me feel beautiful and go for a walk in the park.
I like to play video games with my friends to take my mind off of things.
i have two nephews.
our class is planning a trip to japan.

participant_2.background:
I like to visit websites that have information about my allergies and trophies.
I've been married for 15 years, but I still trip over my own feet sometimes.
i have made over 90 , 000 on trifecta bets alone this year.
My heart breaks when my grandchildren are sad.
i am lazy and pork tastes good.

content.text: Hi!  How are you?  I'm planning a trip to Japan with my class.  So excited!
Hello! I'm good, thanks for asking!  I'm not sure what Japan is, but it sounds nice.  Are you going to visit any museums or anything like that?
I think it's a country! And yes, we are going to visit a lot of museums and temples.  I'm also looking forward to trying all the new foods.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  I hope you have a great time!  I'll be sure to visit Japan one day myself!
Thanks!  I hope you do too!  What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games, watch movies, and read books.  I also like to go for walks in the park and visit my grandchildren.

Wow, you sound like a very active person!  I like to play video games too, but I don't have much time for it anymore.  I do like to read books, though.  I'm currently reading a book about the history of Japan.
That sounds like a really interesting book!  I've never been much of a reader, but I might have to check that book out.
You should!  It's really good.  How long have you been married?
I've been married for 15 years, but I still trip over my own feet sometimes.
Oh wow, that's a long time!  I'm sure you're a great husband.  What do you do for a living?
I'm a stay-at-home dad, but I also do some freelance work on the side.  I'm a bit of a lazy person, but I love spending time with my family.
That sounds like a great job!  I'm sure your family loves having you around.  How many children do you have?
I have two nephews, but I don't have any children of my own.
Oh, that's too bad.  I'm sure you'd be a great father.  What are your nephews like?
They're both very good boys.  They love to play video games and watch movies.  I love spending time with them.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  I'm sure they love spending time with you too.
